channel.title: Make old server like Crazy Pvp?
channel.description:
[b]Hey Guys i need help with making a server with one of those old old sources where its just purely pvp in camelot back when party room was in camelot, anyways... yeah i need help on how to make one... help me get it to work and you get admin on my server... THANKS!
-Dooch ;D[/b]

item.title: Make old server like Crazy Pvp?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Get out of here if you can’t even have people connect.

Its not hard at all

Read full topic
